geckoId.description: GeckoTerminal network ID for this network (e.g., 'eth' for mainnet, 'base' for Base)

swapProvider.description: Default swap router provider for this network (format: connector/type, e.g., uniswap/router)

transactionExecutionTimeoutMs.description: Timeout for waiting for transaction execution (in milliseconds)

gasPrice.description: Gas price in GWEI for legacy (non-EIP-1559) networks (optional, will fetch from network RPC if not set)

baseFee.description: EIP-1559 base fee in GWEI (optional, will fetch from network or Etherscan API if not set)

priorityFee.description: EIP-1559 priority fee in GWEI (optional, will fetch from network or Etherscan API if not set)

baseFeeMultiplier.description: EIP-1559 base fee multiplier for maxFeePerGas calculation (default: 1.2)
